SELECT tt.`id`, tt.`task_id` AS taskId, tt.`case_id` AS caseId, tc.`package_name` AS packageName, tc.`class_name` AS className, tc.`method_name` AS methodName, tc.`case_sign` AS caseSign, tc.`remark`, tc.`del_flag` AS delFlag, tc.`create_user_id` AS createUserId, tt.`create_time` AS createTime, tt.`update_time` AS updateTime FROM ( SELECT * FROM `test_task_case_rel` ttcr WHERE ttcr.`create_user_id` = #{params.createUserId} AND ttcr.`task_id` = #{params.taskId} ) tt LEFT JOIN `test_case tc` ON tt.`case_id` = tc.`id`
and tc.`case_sign` LIKE concat('%', #{params.caseSign}, '%')
ORDER by tc.`id` DESC
LIMIT #{pageNum}, #{pageSize}
